Posted By: BloodDragon (1/4/2011 8:46:53 PM)

posts.post_content: You pay ~how much~ to get a red [Wind Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wind Drake)? :) Of course, this card isn't strictly worse than [Wind Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wind Drake): You can activate the white ability more than once, although I'm not sure how easy you can do this in a three-colored deck.. There are white-blue three-mana 2/3 flyers, there are three-mana 2/2 flyers with another ability, and there's [Azorius First-Wing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Azorius First-Wing) which has protection instead of a third point of toughness.. Also, for just one mana more, you get [Lightning Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Angel) which is from the same set! :)
posts.html:
You pay ~how much~ to get a red Wind Drake? :) Of course, this card isn't strictly worse than Wind Drake: You can activate the white ability more than once, although I'm not sure how easy you can do this in a three-colored deck.. There are white-blue three-mana 2/3 flyers, there are three-mana 2/2 flyers with another ability, and there's Azorius First-Wing which has protection instead of a third point of toughness.. Also, for just one mana more, you get Lightning Angel which is from the same set! :)

posts.post_content:
The sad part is this could have been good if it's CMC was ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol). The white ability would still be useless but you'd be able to swing for two with some evasion in a U/R set-up. Could have been great if the white ability was "![White](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=W&type=symbol): Kavu Glider gains vigilance until end of turn."  
  
The wasted potential of some old cards makes me so sad. :(

The wasted potential of some old cards makes me so sad. :(
